Articles.Content:
So, I have the [K2 (Gemini-ish) pod](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104925) and the pods from the NovaPunch2 pack, are there any other part mods that add command pods out there? I also have the ALCOR pod, but I'm not so much looking for lander pods. Also, not being part of a massive part pack is preferable since I'm already pushing the limits, even with ATM.

I have tried a forum search and a google search, but keep finding the same results.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-25T01:46:01Z" title="03/25/2015 01:46  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 25, 2015</time> by Randazzo**

If you DO find a command pod you like from a parts pack, but dont want the rest of the parts, with most mods you can extract just the pod folder by itself...Or extract everything, then delete all BUT the pod folder...Just watch for any .dlls, .cfgs, texture, or IVA files you may also need that are in other folders...

And yes, there ARE lots of non-stock manned pods out there...

> 
> And yes, there ARE lots of non-stock manned pods out there...

...

Such as?

> 
> So, I have the [K2 (Gemini-ish) pod](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104925) and the pods from the NovaPunch2 pack, are there any other part mods that add command pods out there? I also have the ALCOR pod, but I'm not so much looking for lander pods. Also, not being part of a massive part pack is preferable since I'm already pushing the limits, even with ATM.

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60974-25-HGR-Command-Pods-and-1-875m-parts%28v1-1-Oct-20%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60974-25-HGR-Command-Pods-and-1-875m-parts%28v1-1-Oct-20%29)

> 
> ...
> Such as?

Sorry...There are so many, I dont even know where to start listing links for any...I'll tell you now, a huge number of them ARE gonna be in parts packs...Not just command pods by themselves...

Just go to the Add-On Releases Forum, and start going thru any interesting thread titles for mods...

A good place to start would be in the stickied Mod Library thread:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55401-Community-Mods-and-Plugins-Library](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55401-Community-Mods-and-Plugins-Library)

I'm sure others will reply with some specific examples with links, though...

> 
> Also, not being part of a massive part pack is preferable since I'm already pushing the limits, even with ATM.

You can always prune those packs and just keep the parts you want. Detailed IVAs will still be rather big memory wise.

I collected and documented a bunch in 0.90. [This list](http://www.teuse.net/wiki/ksp/index.php/New_Pods) needs updated for 1.0 and I know of some that are missing now but its a start. Links to the downloads are in the title bars of the tables.

> 
> I collected and documented a bunch in 0.90. [This list](http://www.teuse.net/wiki/ksp/index.php/New_Pods) needs updated for 1.0 and I know of some that are missing now but its a start. Links to the downloads are in the title bars of the tables.

That's super handy, thanks smoore!
